thread.title: Steve Kroft Nails Obama Repeatedly on “Embarrassing” Failed Middle East Strategy; Tells Obama, “I Feel Like I’m being Filibustered” – Video 10/11/15 | Tea Party

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Steve Kroft Nails Obama Repeatedly on “Embarrassing” Failed Middle East Strategy; Tells Obama, “I Feel Like I’m being Filibustered” – Video 10/11/15 | Tea Party
text:
(Before It's News)
View More: 60 Minutes News | Live News | More News Videos
View More: 60 Minutes News | Live News | More News Videos
Barack Obama comes off stunningly bad in this interview with “60 Minutes” Steve Kroft.
I have to say, Kroft nailed Obama and never let up in his questioning of Obama’s “embarrassing” failed strategy there. Kroft used that word, telling Obama it is “embarrassing.” You could tell Obama was furious. At one point, as Obama typically droned on, Kroft told Obama, “I feel like I’m being filibustered, Mr. President.”
The bloom is definitely off the rose!
